name: statusline-advanced
description: Kompaktowa linia statusu 4x3 z parowaniem SESJA/TOTAL i per-user cross-device stats
author: kmylpenter
notes: v5.6: Performance audit - regex pre-filter (C3), atomic writes (M8), dirty-checking (M3), .NET direct calls (m1/m2), compact counter fix (C7), FileStream safety (C4), partial line handling (M9), session ID sanitization (M11). v5.5: Incremental parsing. v5.4: User name from config.
